name: Carpello
description:
How to play:

Cards from the to do list will spawn automatically with time.
You have to drag them into the "Doing" list, and then click on them to complete the task.
After you completed it, submit the card in the "Done" list and you will gain some points! But be careful cause if you leave too much cars untouched they will expire!

Credits:

Riccardo Testa (Reorso) - Games Design student at Glasgow Caledonian University.
https://twitter.com/Reorso_Head

Game made during the GameJobLive Game Parade jam, in 7 days.
